item.title: Looking for coder to fix claws special attack for pi
item.dc:creator: @T7S T7S
item.description:
@T7S wrote:

The special attack bar? That’s easily fixable although I can’t remember which step it is that fixes it. I think it’s this :

Go into ItemAssistant.java and search for :

case 4587:

That should be the d-scimitar.

underneath that you should add

case (Dclaws weapon ID): c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7674); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7686); break;

if not that go to CombatAssistant.java and look for :

case 11694:

directly under that just put

case (D-claws item id):

I hope I got this right :o.

Read full topic
